content: **this pattern is available for free when you sign up for the creative crochet newsletter 1 ** it was featured in a live event for the creative crochet corner you can still watch the video tutorial on facebook over here 2 the bijou headband is a beginner friendly project that uses an easy variation on the slip_stitch to create a stretchy squishy fabric that hugs your head puff stitches decorate each edge creating a bead-like appearance and contrast nicely with the ribbed look of the headband join brenda k b anderson as she demonstrates the skills you need to make this quick project and shares helpful tips for customization 1 http //go creativecrochetcorner com/a31656/ 2 https //m facebook com/creativecrochetcorner/videos/live-with-brenda-anderson-bijou-headband/926176258247930/ refsrc=deprecated&_rdr
